text: The Royals is a 2025 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy drama television series directed by Priyanka Ghose and Nupur Asthana. Produced under Pritish Nandy Communications, it stars Bhumi Pednekar and Ishaan Khatter. The series premiered on Netflix on 9 May 2025. == Cast == * Bhumi Pednekar as Sophia Shekhar * Ishaan Khatter as Aviraaj Singh * Sakshi Tanwar as Padmaja * Zeenat Aman * Nora Fatehi as Ayesha * Vihaan Samat as Digvijay Singh * Dino Morea * Milind Soman * Chunky Panday * Lisa Mishra * Sumukhi Suresh * Luke Kenny * Kavya Trehan as Divyaranjini Singh * Udit Arora as Kunal Mehta == Production == === Development === The series was officially commissioned by Netflix, with Priyanka Ghose and Nupur Asthana serving as director, while Pritish Nandy Communications managed the production. === Casting === Bhumi Pednekar and Ishaan Khatter were cast to appear in the series. Due to creative differences, Mallika Sherawat was replaced with Sakshi Tanwar. === Filming === Principal photography of the series commenced in February 2024 and filming ended in May 2024. The filming took place primarily in locations around Jaipur and Mumbai. == Soundtrack == The song "Tu Tu Hai Wahi", from the 1982 film Yeh Vaada Raha, sung by Kishore Kumar and Asha Bhosle is recreated for the series. On 8 May 2025, Netflix cancelled the song launch event scheduled to be held in Juhu, due to the 2025 Indiaâ€“Pakistan strikes. == Release == The teaser was released on 3 February 2025 and the trailer was released on 22 April 2025. The series was made available for streaming on Netflix on 9 May 2025. == Reception == Sukanya Verma of Rediff awarded the series 2 out of 5 stars. Shubhra Gupta from The Indian Express rated the series 3/5 stars. Abhimanyu Mathur writing for Hindustan Times gave the series 3 out of 5 stars. Pallavi Keswani of The Hindu criticized the storyline. == Other websites == * * == References ==
title: The Royals (2025 TV series)
